name: XYLOMETAZOLINE HYDROCHLORIDE
cautions:
Cautions see under Ephedrine Hydrochloride section 3.1.1.2 and notes above; also
avoid excessive or prolonged use
side-effects:
Side-effects see under Ephedrine Hydrochloride and notes above; in small
children, also restlessness, sleep disturbances, and hallucinations
(discontinue treatment)
